name: Depth Charge (Interface Publications)
overview: You are the commander of a destroyer on patrol in the North Atlantic: your mission is to intercept and sink enemy submarines lurking in the depths, destroying them with depth charges. Be careful: the submarines are armed with missiles and are very good at defensive maneuvers. Published in the book, "More Games for Your Commodore 64" and in Italy in "Altri giochi per il vostro Commodore 64". The 'Z' key moves the ship to the left and the 'C' key to the right. The asterisk drops depth charges.
